messages.title: The choice for change
messages.content: John believes that our area needs a fresh start: a new type of politics. 'Our area needs a break from the tired old politics. I want to make society fairer'.

messages.title: A strong voice for Cardiff North
messages.content: 'I'm passionate about our area. But it could be so much better.'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems plan to make the first £10,000 you earn free from income tax - taking over 6,000 people in Cardiff North out of income tax altogether.
The Lib Dems have set a target of reaching a zero carbon Britain by 2050. By investing in renewable energy, we can create jobs and a greener economy.
Nick Clegg and Vince Cable have been the politicians talking sense on the economy. As well as creating green jobs and a resuscitation plan for under pressure families.
The Lib Dems would ensure that MPs can be sacked by their constituents if they break the rules.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only John Dixon can beat the Tories in Cardiff North.

issues.environment: The Lib Dems have set a target of reaching a zero carbon Britain by 2050.
issues.governance: The Lib Dems would ensure that MPs can be sacked by their constituents if they break the rules.

housing.content: This would be paid for by closing loopholes for the rich and introducing a 'Mansion Tax' on homes worth over £2million.

contactInformation.address: FREEPOST RSLY-LJUX-YSJC, John Dixon, Lib Dems, Cardiff North, CF14 4HY

quotes.text: 'Our area needs a break from the tired old politics. I want to make society fairer'

images.caption: John Dixon speaking to an audience.
John Dixon with Nick Clegg and Vince Cable.
Graph showing only John Dixon can beat the Tories in Cardiff North.

leaflet.additionalNotes: John added: 'Too many people feel let down by our Labour-Tory dominance. I want to make a real difference by working for you'.
